title: Himi 45
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Ko e mo’oni fau
‘E hoko ‘o mate
‘A hoku sino lelei ni
Pea popo ia?
2.
Pea ‘e tuku pē
‘I he kelekele
‘A e ngaahi kupu lelei
‘O hoku sino ni?
3.
Ka ‘e ‘ikai mole
‘A e ngaahi kupu,
He ko hono teu’i ia
Ki he toetu’u.
4.
Pea fakafo’ou
Ko e sino lelei,
Pea ‘e toe hū ki ai
Hoku laumālie.
5.
He ‘oku mo’ui
‘A hoku Huhu’i,
Pea ‘oku ne le’ohi,
Hoku ngaahi efu.
6.
Pea te ne fekau
Ke toetu’u ia,
‘I he lelei ta’engata
Fakalaumālie. *
